description: Lucy is a location based reminder application.  Features of Lucy: -      * Allows you to add up to 10 location based reminders.     * You will be reminded when you are with a mile of the location.     * You have an option to snooze or view the details of the reminder.     * Snooze will delay the reminder for 5 minutes if you are still with in a mile.     * Details of the reminder will have an option to delete.     * Address of the location has to be correct.     * Reminder can be modified by tapping on the item in the list.     * Reminder can be deleted by swiping the item in the list.     * Closing this application will disable the reminders.     * For questions and comments E-Mail.
